sql.name: queryXhCarLoanUserList
sql.sqlString: select a.USER_NAME,/*借款人姓名*/ a.GENDERS,/*性别*/ a.BIRTHDAY,/*出生日期*/ a.TELEPHONE,/*移动电话*/ a.CARD_NUMBER,/*证件号码*/ a.POCERTIFICATES,/*证件类型*/ a.EXPIRED_DATE,/*证件有效期*/ a.IS_NOT_EXPIRED,/*是否长期有效*/ a.HJADRESS,/*户籍地址*/ a.TEMPORARY_CREDE,/*暂住证（有，无）*/ a.HOME_ADDRESS,/*本市地址（现住址)*/ a.HOME_PHONE,/*本市住宅电话(家庭电话)*/ a.FIRST_LIVE_DATE_START,/*起始居住时间*/ a.FIRST_COME_YEAR,/*初来本市年份*/ a.DEPENDENT_RELATIVES,/*供养亲属人数*/ a.MARITAL_STATUS,/*婚姻状况*/ a.HAS_CHILDREN,/*有无子女*/ a.EDUCATION_TYPE,/*教育程度*/ a.CREDIT_LIMIT,/*信用卡额度（万元）*/ a.LIVE_STATE,/*房产*/ a.LIVE_MONTH_RENT,/*月租金*/ a.BUSINESS_TYPE,/*企业类型*/ a.ESTABLISHED_DATE,/*成立时间*/ a.STATE, a.CRMCITY,/*管辖城市(不做查询依据)*/ ( select name from base_city z where z.id=a.crmcity ) as crmcityname, a.CRMPROVINCE,/*管辖省份(不做查询依据)*/ ( select name from base_city z where z.id=a.crmprovince ) as crmprovincename, a.crmarea, ( select name from base_city z where z.id=a.crmarea ) as crmareaname, a.ORGN_ID,/*销售团队(不做查询依据)*/ a.TEAM_LEADER_ID,/*团队经理(不做查询依据)*/ ( select name from BASE_EMPLOYEE z where z.id = a.TEAM_LEADER_ID )as TEAM_LEADER, a.CUSTOMER_LEADER_ID,/*客户经理(不做查询依据)*/ ( select name from BASE_EMPLOYEE z where z.id = a.CUSTOMER_LEADER_ID )as CUSTOMER_LEADER, a.EMPLOYEE_SERVICE_STAFF,/*客服(不做查询依据)*/ ( select name from base_employee z where z.id= a.EMPLOYEE_SERVICE_STAFF ) as staffname, a.KNOWN_WAY,/*客户来源*/ a.PERSON_LAW_CASE,/*客户人法情况*/ a.AREA,/*区县*/ a.CITY,/*地市*/ a.PROVINCE,/*省份*/ a.EMAIL,/*电子邮箱*/ a.kftd, to_char(a.create_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CREATE_TIME,/*创建时间*/ a.ID ,( select count(*) from xh_car_loan_apply t where t.car_user_id=a.id and t.state not in ('009','0','102','81','101') ) as CANEDIT/*申请不在这些状态里（作废、暂存、结清、客户放弃、提前结清）,结果为0则可编辑*/ from XH_CAR_LOAN_USER a where 1=1 $sql
